lead_paragraph: Gains by technology companies were kept in check by struggling energy stocks, as oil prices fell for the fourth day in a row.

headline.main: Wall St. Starts the Month Unchanged

snippet: Gains by technology companies were kept in check by struggling energy stocks, as oil prices fell for the fourth day in a row....
abstract: Stocks recover and finish mostly higher following early trading fall, by 105 points, in Dow Jones industrial average; technology and metals made biggest gains.
